title: 3 Bedroom Newlly Remodeled Apartmen in HOT PILSEN
posting_body: This is a New Apartment 1200sq ft that has been meticulously redone, The unit has New Kitchen Floors, cabinets and Stainless Steel Appliances as well as a New Bathroom.

Very Spacious Living/Dining Room with Huge Picture Window, All Bedrooms have Walk-in Closets as well as Hardwood Floors throughout the Whole apartment, plenty of sunlight and additional working space in the attic(750sq ft) for those Artist with NEW Washer Dryer in unit.
Their is only 5 Homes in the whole block so its very quiet and has Permit Parking, communal Backyard for tenants and plenty of street parking as well as permit parking.
Walking Distance to Costco, Pink Line, Ashland Bus Stop, 18th Street Shops and Restaurants, Harrison Park, Mexican Fine Arts Museum.
Utilities are additional, Central Heat, 2 Window Units AC's Included, 1yr Minimum Lease with Credit Check and only $1100 move in Fee!!!
, small pets are welcomed with Additional $25.00 additional monthly fee.
